snippet.title: GUN JAM | New Rhythm FPS Game | 2022 Announcement Teaser
snippet.description:
Wishlist ➡️ https://store.steampowered.com/app/1308360/GUN_JAM/

We've been working on this fast-paced rhythm FPS game for a while now. We're beyond thrilled to finally share with you that we've partnered with @Rawfury to bring you GUN JAM! 

ABOUT
GUN JAM is an intense rhythm first-person shooter game, where the player must shoot to the beat to survive. Set in the vibrant city of ‘Mubel’, the music will help choreograph the combat while players obliterate enemies by blasting to the beat.

This is just a teaser of what we've been working on. If you like vivid colour, irresistibly catchy music and FPS games, you're going to love GUN JAM. Don't miss a beat and keep up with our development updates, by wishlisting the game on Steam today (link above!) and joining our community.

#gaming #FPS #gunjamgame #videogame #jawdropgames #gamer #game #videogame #steam

COMMUNITY
🔫 Social media links for GUN JAM:
Twitter - https://twitter.com/gunjamgame
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/gunjamgame
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/gunjamgame
Discord - https://discord.gg/bEcH4necJb

💀 Social media links for Jaw Drop Games:
Twitter - https://twitter.com/jawdrop_games
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/jawdropgames 
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/jawdropgames
LinkedIn - https://www.linkedin.com/company/jawdropgames
